pre_caption: This video consists of a single, static shot of a breathtaking night landscape. The view looks out over a vast canyon under a sky filled with stars and a faint band of the Milky Way. The warm glow of a distant city is visible on the horizon, contrasting with the dark, silhouetted mountains.
